mn144:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn144:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
mn144:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
mn144:3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:3.4_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
mn144:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn144:4.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn144:4.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavoca:
mn144:4.3_0: “kacci te, āvuso channa, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ?
mn144:4.3_1: Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti?
mn144:5.1_0: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ.
mn144:5.1_1: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
mn144:5.2_1: balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta,
mn144:5.3_0: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ.
mn144:5.3_1: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.4_1: balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
mn144:5.5_0: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ.
mn144:5.5_1: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
mn144:5.6_1: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta,
mn144:5.7_0: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ.
mn144:5.7_1: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
mn144:5.8_1: dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimatto kāyasmiṁ ḍāho.
mn144:5.9_0: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ.
mn144:5.9_1: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
mn144:5.10_0: Satthaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
mn144:6.3_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni,
mn144:6.3_1: ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.4_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni,
mn144:6.4_1: ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.5_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā,
mn144:7.1_0: “Napi me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
mn144:7.4_1: pariciṇṇo me satthā dīgharattaṁ manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.5_1: sāvakassa patirūpaṁ yaṁ satthāraṁ paricareyya manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.6_0: ‘Anupavajjaṁ channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharissatī’ti evametaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
mn144:8.1_1: sace āyasmā channo okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
mn144:9.1_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi?
mn144:10.1_1: cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā kiṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
mn144:10.6_1: manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā kiṁ abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
mn144:10.7_1: cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
mn144:10.12_1: manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
mn144:11.2_1: idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ, niccakappaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ:
mn144:11.8_0: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṁ na ubhayamantarena.
mn144:11.10_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṁ channaṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
mn144:12.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca mahācunde satthaṁ āharesi.
mn144:13.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:13.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn144:13.9_1: imañca kāyaṁ nikkhipati aññañca kāyaṁ upādiyati tamahaṁ ‘saupavajjo’ti vadāmi.
mn144:13.11_0: ‘Anupavajjo channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharesī’ti evametaṁ, sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
mn144:13.13_0: Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
